title: Ella Fitzgerald - Twelve Nights In Hollywood - 4CD-Box (1961; 20
description:
Ella Fitzgerald - Twelve Nights In Hollywood
Label:  Verve (Hip-O Select)
Format: 4 x CD, Box set
Released:  November 10, 2009
Recorded between May 11th and 21st, 1961, at the Crescendo, Hollywood, CA
Genre: Jazz
